record.name: conclude

manualTransition.mtCondition: jscall("security.getToken", "Knowledge Document", "internal")="true" and same(assoc.published.doc in $L.file, NULL) and evaluate(parse($G.appImmedIntQuery, 4))="true"
manualTransition.mtCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="false"><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="security"><Area caption="Knowledge Management">Knowledge Document</Area><Right caption="internal">internal</Right></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">true</Value></condition><condition logical="and" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assoc Published Doc">assoc.published.doc</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="evaluate(parse($G.appImmedIntQuery, 4))">evaluate(parse($G.appImmedIntQuery, 4))</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">true</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
manualTransition.mtCondDesc: ( the "internal" value in the "Knowledge Management" Security Area = "true" and assoc.published.doc in CurrentRecord = NULL AND evaluate(parse($G.appImmedIntQuery, 4)) = "true")

manualTransition.mtCondition: jscall("security.getToken", "Knowledge Document", "retire")="true" and same(assoc.published.doc in $L.file, NULL)
manualTransition.mtCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="false"><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="security"><Area caption="Knowledge Management">Knowledge Document</Area><Right caption="retire">retire</Right></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">true</Value></condition><condition logical="and" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assoc Published Doc">assoc.published.doc</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
manualTransition.mtCondDesc: ( the "retire" value in the "Knowledge Management" Security Area = "true" and assoc.published.doc in CurrentRecord = NULL)

manualTransition.mtCondition: jscall("security.getToken", "Knowledge Document", "external")="true" and same(assoc.published.doc in $L.file, NULL) and evaluate(parse($G.appImmedIntExtQuery, 4))="true"
manualTransition.mtCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="false"><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="security"><Area caption="Knowledge Management">Knowledge Document</Area><Right caption="external">external</Right></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">true</Value></condition><condition logical="and" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assoc Published Doc">assoc.published.doc</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="evaluate(parse($G.appImmedIntExtQuery, 4))">evaluate(parse($G.appImmedIntExtQuery, 4))</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">true</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
manualTransition.mtCondDesc: ( the "external" value in the "Knowledge Management" Security Area = "true" and assoc.published.doc in CurrentRecord = NULL AND evaluate(parse($G.appImmedIntExtQuery, 4)) = "true")

manualTransition.mtCondXML: <XmlCondition> <collection logical="" negate="false"> <condition logical="" negate="false"> <operand type="security"><Area caption="Knowledge Management">Knowledge Document</Area><Right caption="edit.in.workflow">edit.in.workflow</Right></operand> <Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="boolean">true</Value> </condition> </collection> </XmlCondition>
manualTransition.mtCondDesc: ( the "edit.in.workflow" value in the "Knowledge Management" Security Area = true)

manualTransition.mtCondXML: <XmlCondition> <collection logical="" negate="false"> <condition logical="" negate="false"> <operand type="security"><Area caption="Knowledge Management">Knowledge Document</Area><Right caption="edit.in.workflow">edit.in.workflow</Right></operand> <Comparison>equals</Comparison> <Value dataType="boolean">true</Value> </condition> </collection> </XmlCondition>
manualTransition.mtCondDesc: ( the "edit.in.workflow" value in the "Knowledge Management" Security Area = true)

action.actionCondition: jscall("security.getToken", "Knowledge Document", "revert")="true" and not (same(assoc.published.doc in $L.file, NULL))
action.actionCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="false"><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="security"><Area caption="Knowledge Management">Knowledge Document</Area><Right caption="revert">revert</Right></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">true</Value></condition><condition logical="and" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assoc Published Doc">assoc.published.doc</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
action.actionCondDesc: ( the "revert" value in the "Knowledge Management" Security Area = "true" and assoc.published.doc in CurrentRecord != NULL)

action.actionCondition: jscall("security.getToken", "Knowledge Document", "internal")="true" and not (same(assoc.published.doc in $L.file, NULL))
action.actionCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="false"><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="security"><Area caption="Knowledge Management">Knowledge Document</Area><Right caption="internal">internal</Right></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">true</Value></condition><condition logical="and" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assoc Published Doc">assoc.published.doc</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
action.actionCondDesc: ( the "internal" value in the "Knowledge Management" Security Area = "true" and assoc.published.doc in CurrentRecord != NULL)

action.actionCondition: jscall("security.getToken", "Knowledge Document", "external")="true" and not (same(assoc.published.doc in $L.file, NULL))
action.actionCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="false"><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="security"><Area caption="Knowledge Management">Knowledge Document</Area><Right caption="external">external</Right></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">true</Value></condition><condition logical="and" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assoc Published Doc">assoc.published.doc</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
action.actionCondDesc: ( the "external" value in the "Knowledge Management" Security Area = "true" and assoc.published.doc in CurrentRecord != NULL)

record.updateCond: jscall("security.getToken", "Knowledge Document", "internal")="true" or jscall("security.getToken", "Knowledge Document", "external")="true" or jscall("security.getToken", "Knowledge Document", "retire")="true"
record.updateCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="security"><Area caption="Knowledge Management">Knowledge Document</Area><Right caption="Internal">internal</Right></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">true</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="security"><Area caption="Knowledge Management">Knowledge Document</Area><Right caption="External">external</Right></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">true</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="security"><Area caption="Knowledge Management">Knowledge Document</Area><Right caption="Retire">retire</Right></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">true</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
record.updateCondDesc: ( the "Internal" value in the "Knowledge Management" Security Area = "true" OR the "External" value in the "Knowledge Management" Security Area = "true" OR the "Retire" value in the "Knowledge Management" Security Area = "true")
